fields.text: Thank you for calling Mira, the East Bay fertility tracker that helps you get pregnant faster through personalized hormone analysis.
For questions about using your Mira device and test kits, press [INDEX].
For help setting up your Mira fertility tracker device, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a Mira support specialist for device setup assistance.
For questions about ordering test cartridges or replacing hardware, press [INDEX].
One moment please, we are connecting you to our product team for ordering and replacement inquiries.
For assistance with interpreting your hormone results and ovulation planning, press [INDEX].
For help understanding your hormone readings, press [INDEX].
Thank you for holding. A fertility coach will be with you shortly to explain your hormone results.
For personalized ovulation planning consultations, press [INDEX].
Please stay on the line while we transfer you to an ovulation planning specialist.
